In England, in the seven days to 21 March, there were 32,349 new confirmed cases (57.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 14 March, there were 32,935 new cases, and so the new cases have decreased by 2% (586 fewer cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 26 March is 3,783,783 (6,722.3 cases per 100,000 population).
